casebody.data:
EDISON LIGHT & POWER CO. v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION and Utility Consumers League of York, Pa., appellant. No. 7588. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. May 6, 1941. Rehearing Denied June 5, 1941.

Before MARIS and JONES, Circuit Judges, and WALKER, District Judge.

Sylvan H. Hirsch, of Philadelphia, Pa., for appellant. Harry H. Frank, of Harrisburg, Pa., for appellee. PER CURIAM.

The order of the district court is affirmed upon the opinion of Judge Kirkpatrick, 34 F.Supp. 939.
